explains: n. （尤指宗教原因的）隐士，隐居者；蜂鸟

sentences.en: The true hermit is a rare aberration.
sentences.cn: 真正的隐士是一种罕见的反常现象。

sentences.en: You'd have to do that if you was a hermit.
sentences.cn: 如果你是隐士，你就得这么做。

sentences.en: The hermit muttered, "So--his heart is happy".
sentences.cn: 隐士自言自语道：“哼——他的心里倒是快乐的。”
